## Section 415(2)(b) ITEPA 2003 [EIM13280](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM13280) explained that it is necessary to identify where the type of benefit being provided is dealt with in the benefits code.
### Benefit ### Cash equivalent instruction ### Notes
Use of a car. [EIM23015](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM23015)
Car fuel [EIM25550](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM25550)
Use of a van [EIM22700](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22700)
Medical benefits [EIM21760](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21760)
Beneficial loan facilities [EIM26101](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM26101) The cash equivalent of the beneficial loan is also treated as interest paid and so may be available for relief, see [EIM13320](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM13320).
Mobile telephone [EIM21780](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21780)
Other benefits [EIM21101](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21101) In particular assets placed at the taxpayer's disposal (except cars, mobile telephones and vans, which are dealt with above), see [EIM21615](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21615).
When the value is established, it is income of the year of receipt (see [EIM13100](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM13100)).
